sim.author: VooDoo and The FGUK Development Dream Team with Geed (Sound) Petar Jedvaj, Detlef Faber, F-GTUX, Paolo Amoroso

help.title: Lockheed-Martin F-35B Lightning II

key.name: j/k
key.desc: Adjust Thrust Vector and Convert for STOVL

help.line: To start up and shutdown the aircraft, use the "AutoStart/Autostop" command in the menu, or the corresponding key on the keyboard.
Short Takeoff: Set the Vector nozzle angle to approximatly 30 degrees down (Press "j" 14 times).
Apply full power, hold the stick back. Take off will occur at 90-110kts on a clean aircraft (Press "k" 15 times to ensure 0 degrees position).
Maximum speed - Mach 1.6 at 43000ft.
Vertical Landing/Takeoff: This can only be done with 1/3 fuel capacity on a clean aircraft, or the equivalent weight with payload.
Vertical Landing/Takeoff can take 80-86% power. Do not use afterburner.
*** WARNING - Afterburner will still kick in at 88% throttle while in Vertical mode as no FCS yet exists to control it ***
This aircraft is equipped with automatic flaps and slats.
You can pull up a Special HUD by clicking in the center of the HUD glass.
Press the map on the main screen to switch the "Radar Mode". Press again to switch to "Map Mode".
STATION 1 External: AIM-9M, Smokewinder
STATION 2 External: GBU-12, AIM-120, AGM-154, AGM-158
STATION 3 External: Auxiliary Tanks, GBU-12, AIM-120, AGM-154, AGM-158
STATION 4 Internal: AIM-120
STATION 5 Internal: AIM-120, GBU-12, B-61-12
STATION 6 External: Centerline, Cannon Pod
STATION 7 Internal: AIM-120, GBU-12, B-61-12
STATION 8 Internal: AIM-120
STATION 9 External: Auxiliary Tanks, GBU-12, AIM-120, AGM-154, AGM-158
STATION 10 External: GBU-12, AIM-120, AGM-154, AGM-158
STATION 11 External: AIM-9M, Smokewinder
